txt.en: There are only unremarkable Orc-tools in this crate
You have encountered a warrior who has been taken captive
You have found a set of rusty iron keys. You should show them to Frithstan
Penda fears for the fate of his missing allies. He now believes that they have battled into the territory of the Orcs who dwell in the mountain-caves.
You have found a set of rusty iron keys. You should show them to Frithstan

'Brave and skilled are the men under Frithstan, but they are no match for the sheer numbers of the Orc-horde. I fear that it may already be too late to aid them, but I must know for certain.\n\n'If you have the courage, I would ask you to press onward into the territory of the Mountain-orcs to search for signs of my companions. Look among the Orc-tents and supply-crates for their belongings or for other evidence of their presence.'
The Orcs dwell near the mountains to the north-west of Penda's camp.\n\nPenda has requested a search for evidence of his campmate's presence among the tents and crates of the Orc-tribe.

'An Orc you are not, and you are no Rohirrim...so who are you and what are you doing here? You say Penda sent you?

'Oh, thank you! I am Frithstan. My men and I were captured by the Orcs when we launched an assault against them. 

'Look in the crate to my left and search for the Orc's key-ring.'
Frithstan is bound to a pole among the Orc-tribe in the western Wailing Hills.\n\nSpeaking with Frithstan may reveal the fate of the missing Rohirrim.
There is a crate near Frithstan in the western Orc-encampment.\n\nFrithstan would you like to search the nearby crate for a set of keys.
'Search the Mor-hai camp thoroughly, there must be something there worth finding.'

'The keys! You have found them! If I don such shackles never again, it will be too soon.\n\n'Thankful am I for the pride of these Orcs. They were quite ill-prepared for your attempted rescue. It is shameful to have been captured by such beasts, but I am truly grateful for my release.'
Frithstan remains bound in the western Orc-encampment in the Wailing Hills.\n\nYou have found the keys that he has asked you to look for.
Search the Orc-camp for evidence of the lost warriors
Talk to Frithstan and release him from his shackles
